sources.title: Devil's Cargo (1948) THE FALCON
sources.description:
Stars: John Calvert, Rochelle Hudson, Roscoe Karns 
 Director: John F. Link Sr.

 Poverty-row continuation of The Falcon mystery series showcasing Calvert's magic act skills.

metadata.Plot: Conroy, a playboy, is found shot to death in his penthouse. A ne'er-do-well named Ramon Delgado (Paul Marion) tells the Falcon, Michael Watling (John Calvert), that he committed the murder and asks the Falcon to keep a key for him until after he has been acquitted. He says he feels certain of an acquittal when the police learn that the motive for the killing was Conroy's attention to Delgado's wife, Margot (Rochelle Hudson). Tom Mallon (Theodore von Eltz) enters the case as Delgado's attorney, but after Delgado is found poisoned in his jail cell, the Falcon suspects Mallon of killing his own client.
metadata.Writer: Don Martin, Robert Tallman, Jason James
metadata.Actors: John Calvert, Rochelle Hudson, Roscoe Karns
